title: new to league...and already willing to give up
body: I made my  account which is stuck to US north,couldn't select region...so I said whatever I will create and change after...what to see,u need some sp or such to change after,and finding myself with a huge Ping since I'm from central/eastern Europe...not to mention I went on support on their site,ask me login,I press login,back to support ask me log in again in a infinite loop...wtf is wrong with this website and this region lock. And why the hell cant select my region when I make a new account,how am I suppose to play with such ping.

replies.body: I wasn't able to reproduce an infinite loop with the ticketing system, though the issue does sound strange.  What happens if you try in incognito, another browser, or [clearing your cache](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies)?  That could dissolve anything that was failing to properly redirect you.  We do have transfers available for purchase through the in-game store, and it does cost RP.  Personally, because your level is still pretty low I would suggest creating another account on your closest region.  You could still play on NA if you want, but your ping would be improved on EU.  Let me know if you have any questions!
